responsibilities: Developed ROS2-based firefighter robot with React dashboard monitoring.
Implemented sensor fusion algorithms and ROS navigation for autonomous movement.
Collaborated with hardware engineers to integrate UGV components.
Enhanced real-time communication between robot and web interface using ROSbridge.
Improved system performance through regular testing and optimization.
Developed software for UGVs using ROS for motor control and navigation.
Integrated sensor data for obstacle detection and path planning.
Tested and optimized motor control systems for improved robot response.
Worked on real-time communication between the robot and a remote monitoring system.
Developed an AI-IoT voice assistant for smart home applications.
Implemented natural language processing algorithms for voice command recognition.
Created IoT interfaces for controlling home appliances via voice commands.
Published IEEE paper on AI-IoT integration in voice assistant systems.
